name: 1428: Shadows over Silesia - Deluxe Edition
summary:
The deluxe edition includes 1428: Shadows over Silesia, the soundtrack and two written stories from the world of the game.

1428: Shadows over Silesia
Medieval Europe is in the middle of religious upheaval and many a preacher predict the imminent end of the world. Immerse yourself in a dark fantasy story with true historical events in the background. You'll be facing intricate puzzles, challenging battles and cunning stealth.

Soundtrack
Listen to the soundtrack, which contains most of the in-game music from 1428: Shadows over Silesia. The tracks were composed by a trio of composers - Dark Fantasy Studio, Matyas Vonz and Jan Valta. Some of the tracks are originally composed for the game. For example, God Warriors is a variation on the medieval Hussite chant "Ye Who Are Warriors of God".

Bonus stories
This DLC contains two PDFs with unique short stories from the world of 1428: Shadows over Silesia. Read on to embark on your next adventure with Hynek and Lothar. The stories are available in two languages - Czech and English.
